transportAdvice: Halifax is a compact and walkable city, with the downtown core and waterfront easily explored on foot. A public bus network covers most tourist areas and neighborhoods, and taxis are readily available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold and often snowy with occasional freezing rain, typical of a Maritime Canadian winter.
One of the coldest months, with frequent snow and icy conditions across the city.

Mild and pleasant with blooming greenery, though fog is common along the coast.
